answers.author: Israel Murguia
answers.text:
Hi Thomas,
Attached is several case studies relating to energy plans from cities and towns in Oregon. Specifically those under 10,000 are: Lincoln City, Bandon, Port Orford, Banks, Vale, Echo, and Union. Also, I attached is the Village of Howard's energy plan. While, the town is around 16,000, I thought it might be useful to see a town's plan not relatively not much bigger. I hope this helps.

author: Thomas Jones
text: Are there case studies and/or best practices related to energy plans for small communities (less than 10,000 population)?
title: Energy Plans for Small Communities
